welcome_message_body: Welcome to Contagem, Brazil! Enjoy the city's unique charm, vibrant culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in everything this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pampulha Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pampulha Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
